ftbquests.chapter.0lbeyondr_6creative.qu: Completing this set of challenges allows you to gain a &l&eCreative Bin&r, however the items you can put inside are limited, and after puting something in it you can't change it anymore.
&cYou need to submit these items into the quest, so be sure to use the &l&dFTB Quest Task Screens &r&cto make the task faster!
&d&lCrafting with creative is fun! Or is it?
&lThe cells need to be full of energy!&r
&lThe cells need to be full of Source!&r
&dCreative Bin&r? Do I have one laying around for this?
ftbquests.chapter.6lfull_creative.quest1: You have now full creative items! WELL DONE!
ftbquests.chapter.6lfull_creative.title: &6&lFull Creative
ftbquests.chapter.6the_clwild_r6hunt.que: Completing this set of challenges allows you to gain a &l&eCreative Bin&r, however the items you can put inside are limited, and after puting something in it you can't change it anymore.
&cYou need to submit these items into the quest, so be sure to use the &l&dFTB Quest Task Screens &r&cto make the task faster!
It is drawn to the Pearl
Ok, so the Queen Bee is BROKEN!!!
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest1: Prepare to face the Elder Guardian, armed with a cooking knife to slice through its defenses and claim its treasures. It's a culinary quest where precision meets plunder, and the spoils are as savory as they are satisfying!
Fishy Business with a Splash of Danger

Embark on the daring challenge of the Trial Chambers, where collecting keys is key—and to obtain the Ominous Key, you'll need the Bad Omen effect. It's a labyrinthine adventure where preparation meets perseverance, and each key unlocks a new level of mystery and reward!
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest2: This is the start of the EMC DUPING line of Quests! Have fun AUTOMATING!
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest3: You'll need to mine extensively for materials or utilize EMC to gather them efficiently in Minecraft. Whether you're digging deep into the earth or harnessing the power of equivalent exchange, gathering resources is key to crafting your ultimate creations.
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest4: This will leave you hungry for more. You'll want to craft all the food after taking on this MasterChef challenge!
Stirring Up Flavor, Just Not from the Swine!
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest5: Travel through a Bee Hive, either with a Piston pushing you into it or by tossing an Ender Pearl inside. This place is magical and will leave you exploring all its secrets!
&eFollow the FULL Guide by opening your Minecraft Advancments using the Default L Key
&o&5Note... look up when you find the Queen ;)
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest6: Travel into the Deeper Darker Portal after taking on the Warden!
&dThe Stalker is a mob that spawns by destroying Ancient Vases found in the Ancient Cities and Ancient Temples
&oWhen the ancient Vase is destroyed by a player without silk touch, there is a 9.53% chance that Sculk Leeches will spawn, and a 0.47% chance for a Stalker to spawn instead.
Soul Crystals can now also be found as loot from breaking Ancient Vases!
Into the Abyss, Warden's Portal Awaits
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest7: Embark on a quest to conquer the Dragon, collecting its parts for food and unlocking the secrets of the Apotheosis mod to enhance the Dragon's Breath. It's a journey where culinary conquest meets mythical mastery!
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest8: Venture across dimensions using RFTools Dimensions to craft the Quantum G.O.A.T., hopping from one unique realm to another. It's a journey where each dimension holds its own challenges and treasures, leading to the ultimate creation of dimensional mastery!
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.quest9: Brace yourself for a showdown with the Wither, where survival means mastering the art of defense. Equip yourself wisely, fortify your position, and unleash your strategy—because this battle isn't just about survival; it's about triumph!
Withering Away Was Never This Fun
ftbquests.chapter.adventure_bound.title: Adventure Bound
ftbquests.chapter.cunder_pressure.quest2: Completing this set of challenges allows you to gain a &l&eCreative Bin&r, however the items you can put inside are limited, and after puting something in it you can't change it anymore.
&cYou need to submit these items into the quest, so be sure to use the &l&dFTB Quest Task Screens &r&cto make the task faster!
ftbquests.chapter.cunder_pressure.title: &cUnder &lPressure
By encasing the essence of Archimeat within a magical lattice, you unlock the Archiveau—a mystical creation that harnesses the raw power of its EMC!
You will need 1 full Source Jar for this Craft
Once you've crafted the Archiveau, unleash its stored energy by channeling it into an Energizing Orb. Watch as the Architron Block pulses with newfound power, ready to amplify your EMC gains to unprecedented levels.
Combine the Architron alongside sticky balls and the intense power of Wither gases within an induction smelter to forge the Archimorph block. This fusion compresses its energy, maximizing EMC output for your next level of creations
Next, refine the Archimorph block by dissolving it in a Dissolution Chamber, aided by a touch of oil and boosted by efficiency upgrades. This process compresses it to its smallest form, concentrating it into the Archilution Block, promising even greater EMC gains.
Behold the culmination of arcane mastery! Fuse the Archilution Block with an arsenal of Building Gadgets using the Chaotic Fusion Crafter. Witness the birth of the Archium Block, the zenith of compressed essences, unleashing unparalleled EMC potential!
ftbquests.chapter.emc_automation.title: EMC Automation
ftbquests.chapter.feeling_creative.quest: Once crafted, the Final Star becomes your gateway to unparalleled Creativity in Minecraft. Utilize its immense power to fabricate an array of Creative Items and Blocks, pushing the boundaries of what's possible in your Minecraft adventures. Unleash your imagination and build wonders beyond imagination with this ultimate tool of creation.

Using the power of multiple Final Stars, you discover their arcane possibilities are overwhelming, crying out for the Library of Alexandria. Harness this ancient knowledge to create the Tome of Knowledge, unlocking every EMCable item and block known to the world.
ftbquests.chapter.feeling_creative.title: Feeling Creative
ftbquests.chapter.final_star.quest1.desc: Archium Block is subjected to a torrent of antimatter within an Antiprotonic Nucleosynthesizer, yielding the elusive Fading Matter—a substance of fleeting yet potent EMC essence!
ftbquests.chapter.final_star.quest2.desc: Taking the Fading Matter and dropping it alongside a Transmutation Tablet, then detonating TNT nearby, triggers a cataclysmic reaction. The explosive force ruptures the fabric of space, unleashing a shard of the Final Star into the world—an artifact of unparalleled EMC potential.
ftbquests.chapter.final_star.quest3.desc: After meticulously gathering enough Final Star Shards, you embark on a Precision Assembly Process, infusing each shard with the essence of raw Hyper Experience. With each shard carefully aligned, you merge them seamlessly into a complete Final Star, unleashing a surge of unparalleled Creativity and boundless potential into your Minecraft world.
ftbquests.chapter.final_star.title: Final Star
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest1: Dive into a meticulously crafted modpack focused on automation and EMC optimization.

Harness powerful mods to automate resource gathering, processing, and crafting, reducing the grind and enhancing your gameplay experience. Master the art of EMC management, turning raw materials into valuable resources effortlessly.
From complex machinery to magical transformations, this modpack offers the perfect blend of technology and mysticism, providing endless opportunities for innovation and efficiency.
Questing Your Way!
Welcome To Project Architect 2
Once you have your Realized Dimension Tab (created using the Enscriber), insert it into the Dimension Builder by right-clicking on the Dimension Builder and placing the tab in the designated slot.
The Dimension Builder requires a significant amount of RF (Redstone Flux) power to operate. Make sure it is connected to a power source capable of supplying enough RF to maintain the dimension.

After inserting the tab and supplying power, the Dimension Builder will begin charging the dimension. You can monitor the progress in the GUI. Once the dimension is fully charged, it will be ready for use.
Dimensions by Design!
Architect of Realms
&4&lWARNING: &rMake sure to have a way to return, such as a Matter Receiver set up in the dimension or a charged RF Tools charged porter linked to a Matter Receiver in your BASE!
To enter the dimension, you will need a Dialing Device and a Matter Transmitter. Place the Matter Transmitter near the Dimension Builder and connect it to the same power source.
Use the Dialing Device to dial the Realized Dimension. Select the Matter Transmitter you want to use and the dimension you wish to travel to, then click "Dial."
Step into the Matter Transmitter to be transported to your newly created dimension.
Hopping Dimensions!
Quantum Leap
After defeating the Ender Dragon, locate an End City by exploring the outer islands of the End. Look for tall, tower-like structures. Inside, search for an End Ship, where you'll find the
Elytra—wings that allow you to glide through the air and explore the world from above and craft much better ways of FLYING!
Winging It!
Sky's the Limit

As you explore the dimensions you create with RFTools, keep an eye out for Blobs. These entities provide items necessary for crafting and customizing future dimensions, making them crucial for your custom Dimension Multiverse.

Additionally, seek out special Structures scattered throughout the worlds you create. These contain valuable Dimlets, essential components for designing and refining future dimensions. Explore thoroughly to gather all the resources needed for your dimensional creations.
Blobbing and Dimleting!
Dimlet Diving
&c&lDisable Spiders Crawling: &rIf you prefer not to have spiders crawling, you can easily disable this feature by removing the &o&bNyf's Spiders &rMod from the modpacks mods folder.
Then restart the modpack :D
Arachnophobia!?!
SPIDERS
With the Wall-Jump mod you can:
&lWall Cling&r: Jump towards a wall and hold the wall jump key (LSHIFT)
&lWall Jump&r: While wall clinging, keep holding W and let go of LSHIFT to wall jump
&lDouble Jump&r: Optional mid-air jump
&lSpeed Boost&r: Boosts your speed while sprinting
&lSteep Assist&r: Walk up steps even while airborne, also jump over fences
Climb WALLS!
Stuck in a HOLE!
Hardcore Parkour!
You can use this toggle to turn on and off Dynamic Lights allowing you to see in the dark underground while holding a torch or other light block/item!
LET THERE BE LIGHT!
Dynamic Lights
In the depths of your Minecraft world, the Integrated Stronghold mod enhances the ancient stronghold with new secrets and challenges.
Unveil the Secret Path to the End
Find the Stronghold
The Hidden Passage
When using &6Building Gadgets&r avoid copying or cutting any block entity. These would be entities that contain inventory, have some functionality like holding items, moving things around, etc.
&eDoing this can crash your game, the well-known blocks that cause crashes are:&r
&7-&r All &3Industrial Foregoing: Souls&r blocks
&7-&r All &3Ender Storage&r blocks
&7-&r Some, if not all, &3Applied Energistics 2&r blocks
&7-&r Some &3Create&r blocks, at least from the addons, also tend to cause crashes
Things not to do with building gadgets
Building Gadgets Tips
If your block placers, breakers and others that use &efake players&r aren't working you need to change your &3FTB Teams&r setting.
1. Go to &3FTB Teams&r menu
2. Click the cog/gear on the top right
3. Change the &eAllow All Fake Player&r config to &aalways&r.
Make block placers/breakers work
Fake Players
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest2: ( ` ), located under the &oESC &rkey on most keyboards, look at the blocks you want to mine. Ultimine will highlight the blocks within its range that will be mined together.
Break the highlighted blocks by mining normally. Ultimine will break all the connected blocks of the same type within its range, saving you time and effort.
You can configure the shape and size of the Ultimine area by holding the activation key and &oShift &rat the same time and using the scroll wheel or the up and down arrow keys.
You can upgrade the &3Mekanism&r cables/pipes/transporters/etc. from a previous tier to the next one by &bright clicking&r them with the &enext tier's alloy&r.

When doing this up to &b8&r connected ones will be &aupgraded&r, but if you keep &bright clicking&r the alloys will be consumed and it will keep going down the connected cables until all are &aupgraded&r, doing &b8&r at a time.
Upgrade Mekanism cables/pipes/etc. without breaking them
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest3: When you go mining, just play the game and have fun. Remember, many items have EMC values, so use your Transmutation Table to store most of your mined resources efficiently.
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest4: To travel to the Nether, build a Nether Portal using obsidian and light it with flint and steel. Once there, be prepared for tough enemies and hazardous terrain.
Gather valuable resources, and remember to keep a way back to your portal safe.
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest5: Discovering an ancient city requires exploring deep caves. Once found, prepare for the challenge of the Warden. Equip yourself with powerful gear, move carefully to avoid detection, and be ready for a tough fight.
The rewards in the ancient city are worth the risk!
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest6: &dNow, you might not spawn on the Dragon's Protected Island, but you can seek her out when you are ready! You can always find the Main End Island at coordinates &60x, 0z &din the End!
&rWhen facing the Ender Dragon, consider using a knife from Farmer's Delight. This weapon will give you better rewards upon the Dragon's defeat.
Prepare well, destroy the end crystals, and take down the dragon to reap the enhanced rewards.
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest7: Defeat the Warden and rip out its heart to unlock the portal to the Deeper Darker Dimension. In this perilous realm, you'll face even more skulk-covered mobs and explore eerie structures.
Prepare for an even greater challenge and greater rewards.
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest8: The Bumblezone is a bee dimension filled with many brand new bee-related blocks! There's even quite a few structures to explore and a unique bee armor you can obtain! If you are lucky, you may find a special Throne-Locating Honey Compasses from certain structures that leads you to a Bee Queen!
Note: If you have severe trypophobia and the current textures are too much, you can enable the internal mod Anti-Trypophobia resourcepack
&6To get out of this dim dig up or down into the void!
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quest9: To get started with RFTools Dimensions and create your own custom dimension, you first need an Enscriber. Inside the Enscriber, you will need to insert a Digit Dimlet into the main storage to define a numbered dimension (your first dimensions will be random and don't require a Digit Dimlet). After that, add an Empty Dimension Tab into the far left slot.
You will need o name your dimension (this has to be lowercase with no spaces; however, underscores ' _ ' are allowed. Example: new_world_1)
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.title: &cStarting Out
ftbquests.chapter.issues__credits.quest2: Designed and developed some of the pack's content. Bug fixing, content creation, etc.
ftbquests.chapter.issues__credits.quest3: Fixed some bugs and designed minor content. Also made the end-game challenges.
ftbquests.chapter.issues__credits.title: Pack Credits
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest1.descr: Master fluid and item transport with Pipez Mod. Build networks of pipes to automate resource logistics and power your machines efficiently. Simplify your base management and enhance production with intuitive pipe systems.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest1.title: Pipez
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest10.desc: Discover Modular Routers, a mod that adds versatile routing and manipulation capabilities to automate item transport and management efficiently.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest11.desc: Explore logistical mods that streamline item management and automate processes, enhancing efficiency and organization in your worlds.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest12.desc: Step into the future of technology with LaserIO. Harness the power of lasers for advanced automation, precision filtering, energy transmission, and redstone.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest13.desc: Explore XNet, a powerful mod offering efficient and customizable networking solutions for automating item, fluid, and energy transfer across your Minecraft world.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest2.descr: Connect, transfer, and manage energy and fluids with precision. From pipes to conduits, streamline your systems and let your energy flow with flair!
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest2.title: Thermal Dynamics
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest3.descr: Optimize your operations with Integrated Tunnels, enabling seamless item transport and automation. Build intricate networks and automate resource flow across your base effortlessly.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest3.title: Integrated Innovation
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest4.descr: Streamline item transportation with Create's Conveyor Belts. Effortlessly move items across your workshop or base, reducing manual effort and increasing efficiency.
Master fluid management with Create's Fluid Pipes. Construct intricate networks to transport liquids across your installations, ensuring precise control and efficiency.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest4.title: Mechanical Conveyance
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest5.descr: Streamline item transport with Industrial Forgoing's advanced transporters and belts. Efficiently move materials within your base or across short distances using item filters and regulation, enhancing productivity and automation in your industrial operations.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest5.title: Translocators
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest6.descr: Place your Factory Manager in the world, and connect it to your inventories using Inventory Cables.
Place the Program Disk inside the Manager's GUI
Test some of the preset CODE!
Learn and find out the Power of SFM!
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest6.title: Super Factory Manager
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest7.descr: Deploy Ender Chests to facilitate seamless item transfer between remote locations. With customizable color coding and secure access, streamline logistics and enhance efficiency in your storage solutions.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest7.title: Ender Chest Logistics
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest8.descr: Harness the power of Item Collectors, Vacuumulators, and Absorption Hoppers to effortlessly gather resources from your surroundings. Perfect for maintaining order and efficiency in your automated systems.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest8.title: Suck It Up!
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest9.descr: Take command of advanced machinery and digital logistics with Mekanism Mod.
The Logistical Sorter mod revolutionizes storage management in Minecraft. Effortlessly categorize and direct items with precision using advanced sorting technology.
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.quest9.title: Logistical Mekanism
ftbquests.chapter.logistics.title: Logistics
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest1.desc: Tech! In this quest, you'll dive into the exciting realm of technology-focused mods. These mods introduce a wide array of machines, devices, and automation tools that can transform your Minecraft experience. From crafting powerful equipment to automating resource production, you'll have the opportunity to harness the full potential of technology in your Minecraft adventures. Get ready to discover the innovative and game-changing possibilities that tech mods have to offer!
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest2.desc: Industrial Foregoing is a mod that allows you to automate most of minecraft's functions. It has machines for everything!
- Big item/fluid storage and item/fluid transporters
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest3.desc: Welcome to Create, a mod that provides a wide array of tools and blocks for building, decoration, and aesthetic automation in Minecraft. Our tech elements are designed to empower players with creative choices, allowing you to craft contraptions of animated components that work together in countless configurations.

With Create, the game doesn't confine you to user interfaces; instead, it encourages you to construct intricate systems with moving parts. Explore Create's in-game documentation, 'Ponder,' which will walk you through all the added mechanics and gadgets.
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest4.desc: This mod introduces a wide array of unrelated items, tools, machines, enchantments, and a few potions. To craft some of the more powerful items, you'll need to create these machines.
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest5.desc: Explore the foundational Thermal Series mods, a decade-strong force in modded Minecraft. Unveil pioneering advancements, from Forge Energy to modular flexibility. Experience the evolving, tech-infused universe in this Core and Foundation module.
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest6.desc: Dive into the world of Mekanism, a high-tech mod offering advanced machinery, resource processing, and power generation. Automate your operations with powerful factories, transport fluids and gases, and harness the power of fusion to revolutionize your Minecraft experience.
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.quest7.desc: Embrace the power of Draconic Evolution, a mod that brings advanced technology and powerful tools to your fingertips. Master the art of energy storage, wield devastating weaponry, and unlock ultimate armor to conquer your foes. Harness the chaos, and achieve god-like power in your Minecraft world.
ftbquests.chapter.magic_mods.title: &2Tech
ftbquests.chapter.nonjei_trades.quest9.d: These trades don't appear in JEI because they are a bit bugged, but they do function normally, only the maps are broken. They seem to be able to appear sometimes and work, but sometimes they have air as the item.
NOTE: The icons on top of each trade line tells you the profession and shows you the workstation
ftbquests.chapter.nonjei_trades.subtitle: Shows trades not present in JEI
ftbquests.chapter.nonjei_trades.title: Non-JEI Trades
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest1.subtitle: POWER for POWER
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest1.title: &cGetting Started With Power
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest10.descript: Dive into advanced energy production with the Endergenic Generator from RFTools. Set up involves strategically placing multiple Endergenic Generators in a network, using Ender Pearls as the primary fuel source.
The key to efficiency lies in timing: fire Ender Pearls from one generator to another, maintaining a precise rhythm to generate immense power.
Fine-tune your setup with Redstone timers and sequencers to maximize energy output and fuel efficiency. Master the art of endergenic energy and revolutionize your power generation!
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest10.subtitle: Mastering the Endergenic Generator
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest10.title: &cEndergenic Energy
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest2.descripti: If you have all Mycelial Generators from Industrial Foregoing running simultaneously without stopping, the Mycelial Reactor will produce 25 MRF/T, generating more power than just using the base generators by themselves.
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest2.subtitle: 25 Milion RF Per Tick Generation
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest2.title: &cMycelial Reactor
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest3.descripti: Powah is a tech mod that introduces diverse methods for generating, storing, and transmitting Forge Energy. Let these guidebooks power your path!
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest3.subtitle: I've Got The Powah
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest3.title: &cPowah
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest4.subtitle: Large Multiblock Reactors
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest4.title: &cBigger Reactors
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest5.subtitle: Try Them ALL!
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest5.title: &cIron Furnace
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest6.subtitle: The Power IS HUGE!
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest6.title: &cMekanism Generators
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest7.subtitle: Functinal Power
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest7.title: &cCyclic Generators
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest8.title: &cThermal Power
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest9.subtitle: 'Turn' rotation into ENERGY
ftbquests.chapter.power.quest9.title: &cCreate Power?
ftbquests.chapter.power.title: &cPower
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest1.descri: In this modpack, EMC values are assigned to most raw materials, enabling efficient processing and crafting automation. The goal is to prioritize automation, reducing the grind of continuous mining. By automating item production in exchange for EMC, players can focus on exploring, building, and optimizing their creations without being bogged down by repetitive resource gathering.
This approach encourages strategic planning and efficient resource management, enhancing the overall gameplay experience.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest1.title: ProjectE \&\ EMC
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest10.descr: The Transmutation Interface in this modpack serves as a central hub for accessing EMC-based items through external storage interfaces. You can utilize devices like AE2's External Storage Bus or Refined Storage's External Storage to access your EMCable items efficiently.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest10.title: EMC Storage IO Access
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest11.descr: Harness the ultimate power of EMC with the Project Expansion Final Star, achieving unparalleled mastery over energy transmutation and creation in your Minecraft world.
With this item you can create CREATIVE Items!
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest2.descri: Transform raw materials into valuable EMC with this ingenious device from ProjectE, simplifying resource management and crafting.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest2.subtit: Set it, Forget it, EMC-ify it!
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest2.title: Energy Condenser
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest3.subtit: Like the Energy Condenser but Better
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest3.title: Energy Condenser MK2
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest4.descri: Establish an intricate network of EMC connectivity with Project Expansion's EMC Link, facilitating seamless transfer and utilization of EMC across various devices and systems.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest4.title: EMC Link
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest5.descri: Gain the power of flight with ProjectE's Swiftwolf's Rending Gale. Glide through the skies with ease and explore your world from a new perspective.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest6.descri: Never worry about your tools breaking again with this talisman that automatically repairs them over time.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest6.title: Repair Talisman
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest7.descri: Embrace the blessings of the Harvest Goddess with this band, enhancing your farming efforts and crop yields.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest7.title: Harvest Goddess Band
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest8.descri: Upgrade your Klein Star to store more EMC and unleash its boundless energy. You can right-click it on the left side of your Transmutation Table to store some of your EMC for use with ProjectE's equipment.
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest8.title: Klein Star
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest9.descri: Who said looking good and being powerful can't go hand in hand?
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.quest9.title: Gem Armor
ftbquests.chapter.projecte.title: ProjectE
ftbquests.chapter.resource_generation.qu: The interesting aspect of using Industrial Foregoing's Laser Drills is that the biome where you place them matters a long with the Y lv you set it to. Depending on the biome, you can generate resources specific to that biome, such as Ancient Debris from the Nether Biomes. Additionally, you can increase your chances of obtaining certain ores by using lenses of different colors. This becomes especially powerful when you use more than four laser drills and maximize the upgrades for each.

You can also gather resources by clearing out all the blocks in a designated area. To use the Builder as a quarry, you'll require a Shape Card (Quarry), a Builder, and a Lever. Additionally, ensure you have a power source and a large chest to store the collected items. This is a fun way of gathering large ammounts of blocks from diffrents areas!
Learn to set up farms, machines, and systems for continuous resource production, and become a master of automation to ensure your world thrives. The real challenge lies in organizing it all!
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest1.title: &6Applied Energistics 2
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest10.title: &6ExtendedAE
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest11.descri: MEGA Cells is an add-on for Applied Energistics 2 providing higher tiers of storage, ranging in capacity from 1M to as high as 256M, similarly to add-ons of old such as Extra Cells 2 and its successors.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest11.title: &6MEGA Cells
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest12.descri: This mod adds better Importer, Exporter, Constructor, Destructor, Disk Manipulator, Interface, Requester from Refined Storage and RSRequestify.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest12.title: &6Cable Tiers
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest13.title: &6Requester
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest14.title: &6Refined Storage Addons
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest15.descri: ExtraStorage is an addon from Refined Storage.
It adds 4 levels of crafters, each of which increases the crafting speed and the number of patterns it can hold.
Adds an advanced exporter/importer that has 18 slots instead of 9.
It adds the disks that Reborn Storage added, moreover for each added disk its relative Storage Block and Fluid Storage Block is implemented.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest15.title: &6ExtraStorage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest16.descri: Adds a multiblock pattern crafter and drives. It works just the same as it did back in AE 1.
The max size is 16x16 and it must have at least one CPU and one storage block.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest16.title: &6Reborn Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest17.title: &6RS Infinity Booster
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest18.descri: Step into the future with QIO Storage from the Mekanism mod. This revolutionary system leverages quantum technology to offer virtually limitless storage for all your items. Seamlessly manage and access your inventory with unparalleled efficiency and speed, transforming the way you organize and utilize resources in your Minecraft world
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest18.title: &6QIO Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest19.descri: Seamlessly blend the mystical energies of Ars Nouveau with the technological prowess of Applied Energistics 2. Ars Energistics provides integration for managing and storing Source, the magical power from Ars Nouveau, within the sophisticated storage networks of AE2.
Empower your magical endeavors with the precision and efficiency of advanced tech, creating a synergy that elevates both your spellcraft and automation capabilities to new heights.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest19.title: &6Ars Energistics
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest2.title: &6Refined Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest20.descri: Combine the robust technology of Applied Energistics 2 with the advanced machinery of Mekanism. Applied Mekanistics bridges the gap between these two powerful mods, allowing you to integrate Mekanism's Chemical systems and processing capabilities into AE2's intricate storage networks.
Streamline your resource management, automate complex processes, and create a seamlessly connected base that harnesses the best of both technological worlds.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest20.subtit: Fusing High Tech and Energy Mastery
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest20.title: &6Applied Mekanistics
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest21.descri: Harness the power of Applied Flux to seamlessly store and distribute energy within your Applied Energistics 2 system. This mod allows you to integrate power storage solutions directly into your AE2 networks, ensuring efficient energy management and uninterrupted operations.
Automate your power needs, streamline resource flow, and optimize your base's performance with the perfect fusion of energy and storage technologies.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest21.title: &6Applied Flux
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest22.descri: Storage Mods and Addons Showcase: This quest is a straightforward exploration of various storage mods and their addons. It provides you with a clear list of storage solutions to help expand your inventory, organize resources, and improve your Minecraft storage experience.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest22.subtit: Where does all of this stuff go?
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest22.title: &6Storage Options
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest3.title: &6Deeper Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest4.title: &6More Then Just a Chest
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest5.descrip: Just connect the Item Interface to a storage container, link it with Logic Cables, and then connect a Storage Terminal, and you'll have a storage interface!
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest5.title: &6Intagrated Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest6.descrip: Shift-click the Bookwyrm Charm onto the Lectern, and then use the Dominion Wand to link the inventories to the Lectern."
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest6.title: &6Magic Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest7.subtitl: Early Game of Early Game Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest7.title: &6Modular Storage
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest8.descrip: Storage cells that can store 1k, 4k, 16k and 64k items without any type limit.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest8.title: &6AE2 Things
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest9.descrip: The ME Requester can host 5 requests by default. You can place as many of them as you like on your system and remote access them through the ME Requester Terminal. The terminal allows you to configure the requests and monitor the status remotely.
ftbquests.chapter.storage.quest9.title: &6ME Requester
ftbquests.chapter.storage.title: &6Storage
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest1.descr: In this quest, you'll embark on a magical journey into the enchanting realms of mystical and arcane mods. These mods introduce powerful spells, ancient artifacts, and mysterious dimensions that can transform your Minecraft world into a realm of wonder and sorcery. From mastering the art of spellcasting to summoning otherworldly creatures, you'll delve into the enchanting side of Minecraft. Get ready to explore the captivating and spellbinding possibilities that magic mods have to offer!
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest1.title: &dMagic Starts Here
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest2.descr: Ars Nouveau is a magic mod inspired by Ars Magicka that allows players to craft their own spells, create magical artifacts, perform rituals, and much more.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest2.title: &dArs Nouveau
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest3.descr: Apotheosis is a content mod that allows you to become stronger than ever before, while trying to stay true to vanilla mechanics at heart. Every feature is carefully put together to feel cohesive and complete.
Features range from simple changes, like taller sugarcane, to massive overhauls of core systems such as Enchanting.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest3.title: &dApotheosis
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest4.descr: Reliquary offers a range of magical items and blocks that might pose a challenge to obtain but significantly improve various aspects of a player's life in Minecraft.
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest4.title: &dReliquary Reincarnations
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest5.descr: Through a process called &6Godforged Infusion&r you can enchant a lot of unenchantable items, those items being:
&bChestplate:&r
&oJetpack Armored&r
&bBoots:&r
&oFree Runners Armored&r
&bElytra:&r
&oHDPE Elytra&r
All items follow their Netherite counter part, this is also valid for all Dark and Red Matter tools. The only exception is the &lTools&r defined above which is based of the Draconic Staff.
Hammers use the same enchantments as pickaxes.
To start the process you need to build this altar, you have to have 2 source jars, a center platform with an arcane core underneath it, and 3 pedestals or platforms around it.
The center piece detects things in a single block radius, and you can add up to 5 source jars.
&bSwords:&r
&lNote:&r The Source Jars can be Creative or from ME.
Now, to use the altar you should add the item you want to enchant in the center, then add a &6Godforged Pearl&r and an &dInfused Dragon Breath&r.
You need an &d&lInfused Archiveau&r to be in one of the 3 pedestals around the center, but it does not get consumed.
The enchantment process is going to require levels and source, which is based on the enchants on your enchanted book. To know how much, you can left-click with the book on the center platform.

To activate the ritual of the altar, you can right click the pedestal with the enchanted book. The requirements will be consumed, and the item will remain on the center platform with the enchantments applied. The item remains as you might want to add more books to it.
That is it, have fun enchanting those OP items!
&oMeka-Tana, Red Katar, Red Matter Sword, Dark Matter Sword&r
&bBows:&r
&oMeka-Bow, Electric Bow&r
&bTools:&r
&oAtomic Disassembler, Meka-Tool, Red Morning Star&r
&bArmor Sets:&r
&oMeka-Suit, Gem Armor, Red Matter Armor, Dark Matter Armor&r
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.quest5.title: &6Godforged Infusion
ftbquests.chapter.tech_mods.title: &dMagic
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest1.de: Sometimes, building large structures can be a little tedious, and take a lot of effort. Not all of us a great builders you know! Dire's Building Gadgets aims to make building a little bit easier.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest10.d: Item Collectors adds Collectors which collect items in a specified range! Item Collectors range can be changed and items can be whitelisted or blacklisted!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest10.s: Will Destroy you in Pick Up Sticks
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest12.d: This mod features a straightforward magnet with assignable hotkeys for toggling it on or off. Additionally, you can strategically place demagnetizers in specific areas to prevent the magnet's effect within a localized zone.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest13.d: Shrink is a small mod for Minecraft that allows players to change their player's size.
Shrinking to a smaller size allows the player to access places that they could normally not access without breaking blocks.
You can also change the size of other mobs by punching them with this.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest14.d: Can move mobs simple as that!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest15.d: Why bother with stairs when you can effortlessly teleport to a higher location or perform an impressive single-jump or crouch maneuver!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest16.d: With the Matter Receiver and Charged Porter from the RFTools mod, you gain a powerful teleportation system.
To set the destination for your Charged Porter, simply hold down the Shift key and right-click on a Matter Receiver.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest16.s: Why walk when you can PORT!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest17.d: The Slingshot Mod introduces a fascinating tool to your Minecraft adventures. This unique tool allows you to shoot blocks with precision and creativity.
&lQuick Charge:&r Speed up your block-shooting abilities, making building and designing faster and more efficient.
&lMulti Shot:&r Shoot multiple blocks simultaneously, enabling you to create intricate structures with ease.

&lStasis:&r Discover the exclusive Stasis enchantment, obtainable in end cities. Slingshots enchanted with Stasis gain remarkable capabilities. They can shoot blocks in a perfectly straight line, defying gravity. Additionally, projectiles fired from a Stasis-enchanted Slingshot will display a white block outline, providing a clear preview of where they will land.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest18.d: &lPlacement of Mega Torches:&r One of the primary features of the mod is the ability to craft and place "Mega Torches." These torches emit an exceptionally high level of light, preventing hostile mobs from spawning within a certain radius. They are useful for creating safe zones around your base or in specific areas.

&lFeral Flare Lanterns:&r This mod also introduces Feral Flare Lanterns, which can be used to repel hostile mobs within a designated range. They provide an alternative way to keep your surroundings safe from threats.
&lLantern Control:&r TorchMaster offers control over lanterns' behavior, allowing players to customize their settings. You can adjust lanterns to function as Mega Torches, Feral Flare
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest2.de: Enhance your Minecraft experience with these convenient quality of life mods. Streamline gameplay, improve inventory management, and simplify crafting with these handy additions. Explore the world more efficiently and enjoy a smoother adventure in Minecraft.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest3.de: This mod introduces several portable workbenches mounted on sticks, designed to simplify life, especially in the early stages of your journey. Additionally, you can assign a hotkey to access the crafting table in your Curio slot, allowing you to open it without needing it in your inventory!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest4.de: Sophisticated backpacks is yet another backpack mod this time with backpack you can place in world, color in different color combinations, upgrade with more inventory and enhance with many functional upgrades. UPGRADE AWAY!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest5.de: Do you want to build cool things in Minecraft, like a big sandstone castle, a fiery Nether fortress, a simple dirt house, or even a totem pole with funny diorite faces? Well, you're in the right place! We've got you covered for all your building ideas!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest6.de: This mod simplifies interactions with villagers, offers various helpful blocks, and enhances gameplay related to trading and farming with villagers. Just Shift + Right Click to pick up a villager!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest6.su: No more hassle, just easy trading!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest7.de: Entangled gives you the materials needed to bind two blocks together, allowing you to interact with either one as if they were the same block! This will allow you to transfer items, energy, fluids or whatever you want instantly, you can have more than six sides to work with or you could just hide your messy cables, the possibilities are endless!
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest8.de: The "FramedBlocks" mod for Minecraft, introduces various decorative and versatile blocks that can mimic the appearance of almost any other block in the game. These blocks come in a wide range of shapes, allowing players to customize their builds and add intricate details to their structures.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.quest9.de: Chicken Feeds are a unique feature within the mod that allows players to click them onto chickens, resulting in the production of eggs. These eggs can be of either a Hostile farm or a Passive mob farm variety. When you click these eggs onto dirt blocks, they transform the area into a 5x5 spawning zone, with mob spawns dependent on the specific conditions required by the mobs. For Passive mob farms, it's important to note that grass may grow over time, so periodically clearing the grass is necessary to facilitate mob spawning.
ftbquests.chapter.useful_items.title: &fQuality Of Life
